More than a dozen people were also injured. "Progress every day' On Sunday, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand , said Ms Gabrielle Giffords was "doing great" and "making progress every day". She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Ms Kirsten Gillibrand said on NBC's Meet The Press programme.
